description: Your opponent discards the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>weakest</style></link> follower from hand.
descriptionRaw: Your opponent discards the weakest follower from hand.
flavorText: "The frail have no place in this world. Each day brings them new torment, another turn of the vise. I do not deal in death, I deal in mercy." - Arrel the Tracker
name: Hunt the Weak

description: An ally <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> an enemy. If it has <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link>, deal excess damage to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: An ally strikes an enemy. If it has Overwhelm, deal excess damage to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Oooh the wildman's looking EXTRA savage today! Stay clear of those claws, folks!" - Arena Battlecaster
name: Wild Claws

description: When I'm summoned, if you have the attack token, or when you gain the attack token, <link=vocab.Reforge><style=Vocab>Reforge</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, if you have the attack token, or when you gain the attack token, Reforge.
levelupDescription: I see <link=card.blade><style=AssociatedCard>Blade of the Exile</style></link> in your hand.
levelupDescriptionRaw: I see Blade of the Exile in your hand.
flavorText: "I will not run from what I was. I made a promise to mend what I have broken..."
name: Riven

description:
Give an ally <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link> this round.
<style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Give an ally Overwhelm this round.
flavorText: "A warrior must know the weight of their weapon, burdened heavy with guilt." - Riven
name: Heavy Blade Fragment

description:
Give an ally +2|+0 this round. <link=vocab.Reforge><style=Vocab>Reforge</style></link>.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Riven</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Give an ally +2|+0 this round. Reforge.
Create a Riven in your deck.
flavorText: "To know your enemy, first know their weapon. It will tell you how they move, how they think, when they'll strike. It is the purest expression of its wielder." - Arrel the Tracker
name: Riven's Weapon Hilt

description: Grant an ally +2|+0, <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link>, and <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Grant an ally +2|+0, Overwhelm, and Quick Attack.
flavorText: "But a warrior is more than their weapon alone. They must know power, but also consequence, forgiveness, and redemption." -  Riven
name: Blade of the Exile

description:
Give an ally <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link> this round.
<style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Give an ally Quick Attack this round.
flavorText: "A warrior must know the sharpness of their blade, an edge that cuts both friends and foes." - Riven
name: Keen Blade Fragment

description:
When I'm summoned, if you have the attack token, or when you gain the attack token, <link=vocab.Reforge><style=Vocab>Reforge</style></link>.
Each round, the first time you increase my Power, increase it by twice the amount.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, if you have the attack token, or when you gain the attack token, Reforge.
Each round, the first time you increase my Power, increase it by twice the amount.
flavorText: "...and I will not run from those who would break me."
name: Riven

description:
Give an ally +2|+0 this round.
<style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +2|+0 this round.
flavorText: "A warrior must know their weapon's history... every bloody piece." - Riven
name: Glinting Blade Fragment

description: Give an ally +2|+0 this round. <link=vocab.Reforge><style=Vocab>Reforge</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +2|+0 this round. Reforge.
flavorText: "To know your enemy, first know their weapon. It will tell you how they move, how they think, when they'll strike. It is the purest expression of its wielder." - Arrel the Tracker
name: Weapon Hilt

description: <link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: If you cast a spell on me this round, I <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>weakest</style></link> enemy.
descriptionRaw: Round End: If you cast a spell on me this round, I strike the weakest enemy.
flavorText:
"Hide, we will find you. 
Breathe, we will hear you.
Run, we will kill you."
name: Arrel the Tracker

description:
<link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy.
If you have a <link=card.champ1><style=AssociatedCard>Darius</style></link>, <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Stun an enemy.
If you have a Darius, Rally.
flavorText: "I'll handle this myself." - Darius
name: Apprehend

flavorText: "There is nothing like hunting another soldier. To track them, you must think and feel as they do. To catch them, you must fear them as they fear you. It is a bond that few will know, but one I savor above all others."
name: Wrathful Rider

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Deal 1 to an ally and an enemy 4 times.
descriptionRaw: Play: Deal 1 to an ally and an enemy 4 times.
flavorText: The basilisk trainers withhold live food from the beasts in the days leading up to battle. By the time the creatures are unleashed, they do not distinguish friend from foe, and are utterly indomitable.
name: Basilisk Bloodseeker

description: Deal 1 to an ally and an enemy 4 times.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to an ally and an enemy 4 times.
flavorText: "It's not the sharpness of the claws you've got to look out for, it's the appetite of the beast that's grown 'em." - Basilisk trainer
name: Gouge

description:
Allies can't drop below 1 health this round.
When discarded, your <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> ally can't drop below 1 health this round.
descriptionRaw:
Allies can't drop below 1 health this round.
When discarded, your strongest ally can't drop below 1 health this round.
flavorText: "The drakehounds have the scent. They will find her, and we will finish this. There is no other way." - Arrel the Tracker
name: Survival Skills

description: Give an ally +3|+2 this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +3|+2 this round.
flavorText: "Yeah, I'll mend your weapons, and tend to the mounts, and cook your bloody food. What else am I good for, eh?" - Erath, Blade Squire
name: Sharpened Resolve

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: <link=vocab.Reforge><style=Vocab>Reforge</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Reforge.
flavorText: "Like the huntresses said--a hundred days and nights. A hundred blisters on these feet, a hundred bugs in my breakfast, a hundred 'blade'-this and 'vengeance' that. And well more than a hundred brow-beatings from those three, I'll tell you..."
name: Blade Squire

description: When I'm summoned, <link=vocab.Reforge><style=Vocab>Reforge</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, Reforge.
flavorText: "Most weapons are crude tools, no better than the hands that wield them. But a weapon infused with runic magic is so much more than mere steel."
name: Runeweaver

description: When I'm summoned, give me <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, give me Quick Attack this round.
flavorText: "There you are. We KNEW you wouldn't come without a fight! Or so we hoped."
name: Brutal Hunter

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Sleep with the Fishes</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Create a Sleep with the Fishes in hand.
flavorText: Years in the boxing ring taught Jack valuable lessons. He learned that if his opponent can bleed, they can fear. He learned the power of a silent stare. He learned the power of uncontrolled violence.
name: Jack, the Winner

description: An ally <link=keyword.Capture><sprite name=Capture><style=Keyword>Captures</style></link> another ally and gains the captured ally's stats.
descriptionRaw: An ally Captures another ally and gains the captured ally's stats.
flavorText: "Step inside, friend, and all that you desire shall be yours in perpetuity." - Tahm Kench
name: Bayou Brunch

description: Place a unit or landmark into its deck.
descriptionRaw: Place a unit or landmark into its deck.
flavorText: "Now, I delivered to you exactly what you wanted, friend. I never said it would last forever." - Tahm Kench
name: Sunk Cost

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>An Acquired Taste</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Create a An Acquired Taste in hand.
levelupDescription: I've <link=keyword.Capture><sprite name=Capture><style=Keyword>Captured</style></link> 3+ units<style=Variable></style>. When I level up, <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> my <link=keyword.Capture><sprite name=Capture><style=Keyword>Captured</style></link> enemies and release my allies.
levelupDescriptionRaw: I've Captured 3+ units. When I level up, Obliterate my Captured enemies and release my allies.
flavorText: "My friend, I know that expression. I can see you feelin' like the cards you're holdin' ain't the ones you deserve. You got a desire for the finer things, don'tcha? Perhaps you'll allow me to satisfy your hunger, let you savor all that you ever desired. All I need is your name, scratched on my paper... and you, my friend, will be satisfied for life."
name: Tahm Kench

description: <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Tahm Kench</style></link> swallows an enemy unit. It <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> him, then he <link=keyword.Capture><sprite name=Capture><style=Keyword>Captures</style></link> it.
descriptionRaw: Tahm Kench swallows an enemy unit. It strikes him, then he Captures it.
flavorText: "You had a chance to walk away. Instead, you're the fool who let me in..." - Tahm Kench
name: An Acquired Taste

description:
<link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>An Acquired Taste</style></link> in hand.
<link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> my <link=keyword.Capture><sprite name=Capture><style=Keyword>Captured</style></link> enemies and release my allies.
descriptionRaw:
Round Start: Create a An Acquired Taste in hand.
Attack: Obliterate my Captured enemies and release my allies.
flavorText: "You struck a deal, my friend, and though you will undoubtedly bask in its benefits, remember... there will be a time when I get my fill, too."
name: Tahm Kench

description:
An ally <link=keyword.Capture><sprite name=Capture><style=Keyword>Captures</style></link> another ally and gains the captured ally's stats.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Tahm Kench</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
An ally Captures another ally and gains the captured ally's stats.
Create a Tahm Kench in your deck.
flavorText: "Step inside, friend, and all that you desire shall be yours in perpetuity." - Tahm Kench
name: Tahm Kench's Bayou Brunch

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Deal 2 to me.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Deal 2 to me.
flavorText: "Ah, people are stupid! Give them cold drink and warm chair, and they tell all kinds of secrets to friendly faces. And who has friendlier face than young Leonard, hmm?" - Fortune Croaker
name: Lounging Lizard

description:
Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Powder Monkey</style></link>.
<link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: Summon another at the next <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Summon a Powder Monkey.
Plunder: Summon another at the next Round Start.
flavorText: "Aw... d'ye think they're cute? WELL, THEY'RE NOT. They get into everything, they're messier than a seasick courier, an' THEY WON'T BLOODY SHUT UP. NO MONKEYS ON THE SHIP. THAT'S THE END OF IT." - Petty Officer
name: Monkey Business

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Deal 3 to me.
descriptionRaw: Play: Deal 3 to me.
flavorText: "Sure, Pablo might be in a bit of a 'dry patch'--heh--and, yeah, he's taken his fair share of punches... but ya know what? Ain't nobody else around here getting octokills, pal." - Wise Fry
name: Boxtopus

description: Deal 2 to an ally to deal 2 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 to an ally to deal 2 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Daub 'em with your blood, and set the sharks loose." - Jack, the Winner
name: Sleep with the Fishes

description:
Deal 1 to a unit.
Then summon <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Powder Kegs</style></link> equal to the amount of damage dealt.
descriptionRaw:
Deal 1 to a unit.
Then summon Powder Kegs equal to the amount of damage dealt.
flavorText: "Young Gerent raised the alarm right afore the first one blew. Our hull rocked, the jib caught flame, but the Jilldaw held. Thought that was that, but as I followed Gerent's gaze out to sea, I saw me four more rowboats comin' our way, all loaded with powder." - Jilldaw survivor
name: Boomship

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: <link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Toss</style></link> 1. If you are <link=keyword.Deep><sprite name=Deep><style=Keyword>Deep</style></link>, destroy me to summon a random Sea Monster. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Toss 1. If you are Deep, destroy me to summon a random Sea Monster.
flavorText: Every day, locals wander through the Slaughter Docks to see the horrors Bilgewater's hunters have hauled up from the depths. The beasts are usually dead. Usually.
name: The Slaughter Docks

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Deal 2 to me.
descriptionRaw: Play: Deal 2 to me.
flavorText: "RING THE BELL, WILL YA?! AH'LL SHOW THAT POINTY FART WHY AH'VE GOT ALL MA NICKNAMES, AYE. 'EIGHT PUNCH PABLO', 'THE CRACKIN' KRAKEN', 'THE TENTACLED TERROR'! YOUR WEE STINGER'S GONNA BE CRYING FOR YA MAMMIE BY THE TIME AH'M DONE WI' YA!" - Boxtopus
name: Crusty Codger

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Deal 1 to all other allies and grant me +1|+0 for each of them.
descriptionRaw: Play: Deal 1 to all other allies and grant me +1|+0 for each of them.
flavorText: The rise to power is often a violent business... but it's not normally this freakin' sloppy.
name: Wise Fry

description:
Reduce my cost by 1 for each spell you've cast this game.
When I'm summoned, create in hand a random 1 cost spell from your regions.
descriptionRaw:
Reduce my cost by 1 for each spell you've cast this game.
When I'm summoned, create in hand a random 1 cost spell from your regions.
flavorText: "Stand stwait, noobie! Your mishun is to infiltrate behind emenee lines, plant as many bubbels as you can, an' tell us evewythin' you SEE! E-VE-WEE-THIN'. DO YOU UNNASTAN'?!" - Admiwal Shelly, Shellshocker
name: Wiggly Burblefish

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Deal 1 to me and an ally to draw 1.
descriptionRaw: Play: Deal 1 to me and an ally to draw 1.
flavorText: "Ol' Babs has had a few mishaps. Killed a few locals in her time, but I s'pose it helps lend her an air of authenticity." - Lounging Lizard
name: Fortune Croaker

description: Summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Powder Monkey</style></link> and give a random enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> this round for each time you've activated <link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link> this game. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Summon a Powder Monkey and give a random enemy Vulnerable this round for each time you've activated Plunder this game.
flavorText: "Oh, those little sootballs aren't so bad. Here's a tip for you--they like fireworks. So, you take out an enemy's gunpowder stores, and the monkeys, well, they'll do the rest." - Miss Fortune
name: Powder Pandemonium

description: Deal 2 to an ally to grant 2 enemies <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 to an ally to grant 2 enemies Vulnerable.
flavorText: "You gonna tell me where you got those 'extra kegs', Slim? Huh? Otherwise, we could play a lil' tug-of-war between your tongue and Jimbo's arm. And buddy... I ain't bettin' on you." - Wise Fry
name: Shakedown

description: When an ally is summoned, give it +1|+0 and <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: When an ally is summoned, give it +1|+0 and Challenger this round.
flavorText: Tianna looked out over the assembly, assessing the gathered ranks. The only sound in the square was her banner snapping in the breeze. She gave a curt nod of approval, then lifted the banner with a shout. "Who among you is ready to fight for Demacia?" The resounding cry from all those assembled shook the very mountains.
name: The Grand Plaza

description: Draw a landmark or destroy a landmark.
descriptionRaw: Draw a landmark or destroy a landmark.
flavorText: Targon is a capricious place, where the unbreakable is broken, and the broken made whole.
name: Divergent Paths

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create in hand a random level 2 champion that's not in your hand, deck, or play.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Create in hand a random level 2 champion that's not in your hand, deck, or play.
flavorText: Heroes come to the bridge, called to it by something from the unknown. They brave its bitter cold and crumbling deck to see what lies beyond--victory, or death.
name: The Howling Abyss

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: If you can, kill your most expensive ally to summon an ally from your deck that costs 1 more.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: If you can, kill your most expensive ally to summon an ally from your deck that costs 1 more.
flavorText: What could better lure a soul to this wretched place than the promise of eternal life, and endless riches?
name: Vaults of Helia

description: <link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: Heal damaged allies 1. Then, once I've seen you heal 22+ damage from allies, win the game. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Round End: Heal damaged allies 1. Then, once I've seen you heal 22+ damage from allies, win the game.
flavorText:
"Up to the sacred falling flow,
Deep into pools, the healing springs
Shining light, water all aglow,
Listen to how the river sings,
High on the crystal mountain."
- Ottrani verse
name: Star Spring

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Sanctuary</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Create a Sanctuary in hand.
flavorText: The Ionian mountains hide a handful of sanctuaries for those looking to center themselves and gather their spirits.
name: Monastery of Hirana

description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an ally.
descriptionRaw: Recall an ally.
flavorText: "The monastery welcomes all who seek refuge." - Elder Souma
name: Sanctuary

description: Kill a damaged unit or destroy a landmark.
descriptionRaw: Kill a damaged unit or destroy a landmark.
flavorText: "The drakehounds have the scent. They will find her, and we will finish this. There is no other way." - Arrel the Tracker
name: Scorched Earth

description: <link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: Your <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> ally and the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>weakest</style></link> enemy <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> each other.
descriptionRaw: Round End: Your strongest ally and the weakest enemy strike each other.
flavorText: "Hey there, rrrrreckoner fans, are you ready for a night of scorchin' hot THRILLS in the RING OF FIRE?! Wuh-oh, looks like Tiny Trik drew the SHORT straw today. He's up against the mighty, fight-y, GRANAAAAK the Great! Get those medics ringside, it's gonna be a quick one!" - Arena Battlecaster
name: Noxkraya Arena

description: Destroy a landmark.
descriptionRaw: Destroy a landmark.
flavorText: Each summit gave way before them, emboldening their climb and filling their hearts with determination. They would scale Targon.
name: Path of Destruction

description: Draw a landmark.
descriptionRaw: Draw a landmark.
flavorText: Beyond each summit loomed yet another, but their spirits pushed them onward. They would surmount the peaks of Targon.
name: Path of Discovery

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Capture><sprite name=Capture><style=Keyword>Capture</style></link> a unit or landmark.
descriptionRaw: Play: Capture a unit or landmark.
flavorText: As a child, Arrika saw firsthand the devastation Noxus could inflict as it laid waste to her home. When she enlisted in the military, she vowed never to let the Noxian flag fly over Demacian land, or leave another child orphaned.
name: Captain Arrika

description: <link=keyword.Capture><sprite name=Capture><style=Keyword>Capture</style></link> a unit or landmark.
descriptionRaw: Capture a unit or landmark.
flavorText: "Take back what is ours!" - Captain Arrika
name: Claim

description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an ally unit or landmark to <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an enemy unit or landmark.
descriptionRaw: Recall an ally unit or landmark to Recall an enemy unit or landmark.
flavorText: "Trevvvvorrrrrr, come baaaack..." - Trevor's house
name: Homecoming

description: Kill an ally to kill a unit or destroy a landmark.
descriptionRaw: Kill an ally to kill a unit or destroy a landmark.
flavorText: Nothing lasts on these haunted isles. All will end.
name: Crumble

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Reduce the cost of a random card in each player's hand to 0 this round.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Reduce the cost of a random card in each player's hand to 0 this round.
flavorText: Standing watch at the gate to the Celestial Realm is Targon's crystalline guardian. Things fall away in it's presence - hope, doubt, fear. Its trials strip all mortal concerns, and lays bare the essence of the climber's soul. It is on this that they are judged, for the guardian is the great arbiter.
name: Targon's Peak

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Discard your hand. Create 3 random cards in hand and grant them <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Discard your hand. Create 3 random cards in hand and grant them Fleeting.
flavorText: The inventions of Professor Cecil B. Heimerdinger made him famous, but it was his animated lectures and notoriously unpredictable classroom demonstrations that earned him a lasting impression on Piltover's brightest minds.
name: The University of Piltover

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> ALL landmarks or deal 2 to ALL other units.
descriptionRaw: Play: Obliterate ALL landmarks or deal 2 to ALL other units.
flavorText: "There was no time to gather our things or warn the others. We could only run for the forest and watch as it leveled our homes." - Avarosan Hearthguard
name: It That Stares

description: Deal 2 to ALL other units.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 to ALL other units.
flavorText: The people shall perish.
name: Extinguishing Ray

description: <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> ALL landmarks.
descriptionRaw: Obliterate ALL landmarks.
flavorText: The earth shall break.
name: Destructive Ray

description: I cost 2 less if you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> a Celestial.
descriptionRaw: I cost 2 less if you Behold a Celestial.
flavorText: "Adults are LAME. The only cool kids around here are Zoe and her buddies. I learn a lot from them, y'know? Not like that stupid high radiance priestess lady. I mean UGHHHH."
name: Starry Scamp

description: <link=keyword.Invoke><style=Keyword>Invoke</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Invoke.
flavorText: The heavens hang over you, a tapestry of black lit with twinkling stars. You are small and dim against its vastness. Where will you turn your gaze first?
name: Behold the Infinite

description: When I'm summoned, draw 1.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, draw 1.
flavorText:
"As leaves unfurl from barren branches, the Lady of Spring sends her messenger to inform the Lord of Winter of the changing season. The messenger's bark startles the stars into new places in the sky, while his loyal heart warms the land." 
- Song of the Seasons
name: The Messenger

flavorText:
"During Targon's first equinox, the people of the mountain attempted their first truce. But as their leaders laid their weapons down, one suddenly cried out in pain! Soldiers drew their spears, and all thoughts of peace were lost. Little did they know the true betrayer was a serpent hidden beneath their feet, forevermore a sign of violent times." 
- Targonian folk tale
name: The Serpent

description:
When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+0 for each Celestial card you played this game. <style=Variable></style>
The first time I would die, fully heal me instead.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+0 for each Celestial card you played this game. 
The first time I would die, fully heal me instead.
flavorText: "For ages, the Immortal Fire flew alone, till one day she saw a young bird with fiery golden wings like hers. She rejoiced, for she had never known another like herself. But as years passed, the young bird grew old and flickered out. The Immortal Fire grieved, for she had never known death. And so she wept sparks and sighed herself ablaze, till she emerged, renewed in body but burdened with knowledge." - Shuriman folk tale
name: The Immortal Fire

description: Reduce the cost of a card in hand by 1.
descriptionRaw: Reduce the cost of a card in hand by 1.
flavorText: "Each full moon bathes our world in Her silver glow, revealing paths not yet trod, stories not yet told." - Lunari Priestess
name: Moonsilver

description:
When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+0 for each Celestial card you played this game. <style=Variable></style>
<link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Give other allies +2|+2 and <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+0 for each Celestial card you played this game. 
Attack: Give other allies +2|+2 and Overwhelm this round.
flavorText: Legends speak of a Scourge that lurks at the furthest reaches of the Celestial Realm. Here, it awaits the time-at-the-end-of-time, when it will wield the power of the stars to shatter the foundations of the world.
name: The Scourge

description: When I'm summoned, summon <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>The Silver Sister</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, summon The Silver Sister.
flavorText:
"From the heavens
Two beings came:
One was robed in silver's glow,
The other clad in golden flame..."
- Hymn of the Hours
name: The Golden Sister

description: Grant an ally +0|+2 and <link=keyword.SpellShield><sprite name=SpellShield><style=Keyword>SpellShield</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Grant an ally +0|+2 and SpellShield.
flavorText: "Bathe in Her gentle glow and receive Her blessing." - Lunari Priestess
name: Moonglow

description: Draw a champion. Reduce its cost by 1 and grant it +2|+2.
descriptionRaw: Draw a champion. Reduce its cost by 1 and grant it +2|+2.
flavorText: "The vastness of the night sky represents the gulf between humanity below and the divine above. But there are some mortals who strive to achieve a higher purpose, and if the mountain deems them worthy, they may rise to become one with the stars themselves." - Mountain Scryer
name: Written in Stars

description: If you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> a Celestial card, <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> 2 enemy units or landmarks.
descriptionRaw: If you Behold a Celestial card, Obliterate 2 enemy units or landmarks.
flavorText: Dying stars create explosions so bright and powerful that even other stars, still lively and burning, are easily outshone.
name: Supernova

description: If you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> a Celestial card, grant allies <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +2|+2.
descriptionRaw: If you Behold a Celestial card, grant allies everywhere +2|+2.
flavorText: "Look to the night sky. Take in the stars' brilliance, and let them suffuse you with their healing light." - Soraka
name: Cosmic Inspiration

description: Fill your hand with random <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> Celestial cards. Refill your mana to full.
descriptionRaw: Fill your hand with random Fleeting Celestial cards. Refill your mana to full.
flavorText: "They say that some constellations were once mortals whose exceptional exploits earned them a place amongst the stars." - Mountain Scryer
name: Living Legends

description: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+0 for each Celestial card you played this game. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+0 for each Celestial card you played this game.
flavorText: "To safeguard the spaces between land and sky, a horned guardian was placed in the stars over the mountains. Sturdy and swift, it traverses the night sky in search of intruders, whom it greets with an impact that sends shudders through earth and sky alike." - The Minotaur Histories
name: The Destroyer

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Invoke><style=Keyword>Invoke</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Invoke.
flavorText: "We were always one and the same--we were separated only by the mountain, the journey, and a sea of stars."
name: The Traveler

description: Deal 4 to an enemy and 1 to another.
descriptionRaw: Deal 4 to an enemy and 1 to another.
flavorText: "Forging stars is a messy business, I'm afraid. You never know where those little rocks will land. I am so terribly, terribly sorry if they happen to fall on you. And crush you. Oh so violently." - Aurelion Sol
name: Meteor Shower

description: <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> an enemy unit or landmark.
descriptionRaw: Obliterate an enemy unit or landmark.
flavorText: "I will drive the stars themselves through this insufferable place. It will be GLORIOUS." - Aurelion Sol
name: Falling Comet

description:
When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+0 for each Celestial card you played this game. <style=Variable></style>
I am a Dragon.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+0 for each Celestial card you played this game. 
I am a Dragon.
flavorText: "Oh yes, my favorite constellation. I like to think it will be the first to rain down upon this forsaken mountain." - Aurelion Sol
name: The Great Beyond

description: If you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> a Celestial card, <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> enemies with 3 or less Power.
descriptionRaw: If you Behold a Celestial card, Obliterate enemies with 3 or less Power.
flavorText: In the dark beginning, a spark of creation rippled through the universe. What sound it made, what light it shone, we will never know, for there were not yet then words to describe, nor yet ears or eyes to perceive it.
name: Cosmic Rays

description: <link=vocab.Silence><style=Vocab>Silence</style></link> a follower.
descriptionRaw: Silence a follower.
flavorText: In the space between the stars, there is absolute silence.
name: Equinox

flavorText: The strongest star in the night's sky, they say, is that of the warrior. An ancient being, thought immortal, who descends from the stars to prove his worth in combat. Never has he been beaten, but all stories must end, and all stars must die.
name: The Warrior

description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> 2 enemies.
descriptionRaw: Stun 2 enemies.
flavorText: "Even the moon's glow can be blinding." - Diana
name: Crescent Strike

flavorText: "So, there I was going 'bout my day, when in struts this fella packed to the gills with gold. Easy mark, eh? I sidle over, amp up the charm, and amp up the price. It's only when I put my coins away I realize the little scamp's paid me with my OWN money! The Trickster was shining bright that night, I tell ya." - Yordle Grifter
name: The Trickster

flavorText:
"...Though both were formed of cosmic light,
They fought, for they were too alike.
And so these two split night from day,
So each could always have their way..."
- Hymn of the Hours
name: The Silver Sister

flavorText: "The gold of the sun adorns his horns, and its fire lights his heart. Let the thunder of our shields ring out like the thunder of his hooves across the horizon!" - Solari battle prayer
name: The Charger

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Invoke><style=Keyword>Invoke</style></link> a Celestial card that costs 3 or less.
descriptionRaw: Play: Invoke a Celestial card that costs 3 or less.
flavorText:
"Mother Moon, show me the way,
Tear the sky open,
Show me beyond."
- Lunari Prayer
name: The Fangs

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Duskpetal Dust</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Duskpetal Dust in hand.
flavorText: "Duskpetals bloom at night, and then only under a full moon. A proud symbol of the Lunari, we have used their dust for centuries, as only we know how to harvest them safely."
name: Lunari Duskbringer

description: The next unit with <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link> you play this round costs 1 less.
descriptionRaw: The next unit with Nightfall you play this round costs 1 less.
flavorText: The fragrance of the duskpetal is like none other. Sweet and strange, but fleeting, it is delicate as moonlight itself.
name: Duskpetal Dust

description:
<link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Pick a Moon Weapon to create in hand.
Each round, the first time you play 2 other cards, create the <link=vocab.Phase><style=Vocab>Phased</style></link> Moon Weapon in hand if you don't already have one.<style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw:
Nightfall: Pick a Moon Weapon to create in hand.
Each round, the first time you play 2 other cards, create the Phased Moon Weapon in hand if you don't already have one.
flavorText: "With every conflict, we show the Solari we are worthy of respect. We have taught them that the moon's light is equal to their sun's, we have taught them not to disregard that which they did not know. And of the lessons they are yet to learn..." - Lunari wanespeaker
name: Aphelios

description: Summon a two cost follower from your deck. If it has <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>, activate it. <link=vocab.Phase><style=Vocab>Phase</style></link> <link=card.Calibrum><style=AssociatedCard>Calibrum</style></link> or <link=card.Severum><style=AssociatedCard>Severum</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Summon a two cost follower from your deck. If it has Nightfall, activate it. Phase Calibrum or Severum.
flavorText: "A crescent path opens before us." - Alune
name: Crescendum

description: Give an ally +2|+1 and <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link> this round. <link=vocab.Phase><style=Vocab>Phase</style></link> <link=card.Crescendum><style=AssociatedCard>Crescendum</style></link> or <link=card.Calibrum><style=AssociatedCard>Calibrum</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +2|+1 and Overwhelm this round. Phase Crescendum or Calibrum.
flavorText: "The moon grows in flame." - Alune
name: Infernum

description:
Pick a Moon Weapon to create in hand.
Create an <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Aphelios</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Pick a Moon Weapon to create in hand.
Create an Aphelios in your deck.
flavorText: "Reach out, Aphelios..." - Alune
name: Aphelios' Gifts From Beyond

description: Give an ally +1|+2 and <link=keyword.Lifesteal><sprite name=Lifesteal><style=Keyword>Lifesteal</style></link> this round. <link=vocab.Phase><style=Vocab>Phase</style></link> <link=card.Gravitum><style=AssociatedCard>Gravitum</style></link> or <link=card.Infernum><style=AssociatedCard>Infernum</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +1|+2 and Lifesteal this round. Phase Gravitum or Infernum.
flavorText: "From darkness, light." - Alune
name: Severum

description: Deal 3 to a follower. <link=vocab.Phase><style=Vocab>Phase</style></link> <link=card.Severum><style=AssociatedCard>Severum</style></link> or <link=card.Gravitum><style=AssociatedCard>Gravitum</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Deal 3 to a follower. Phase Severum or Gravitum.
flavorText: "Move sure as the moon, Brother." - Alune
name: Calibrum

description:
<link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Pick a Moon Weapon to create in hand.
Each round, the first time you play 2 other cards or <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create the <link=vocab.Phase><style=Vocab>Phased</style></link> Moon Weapon in hand if you don't already have one.<style=Variable></style>
Your Moon Weapons cost 1 less.
descriptionRaw:
Nightfall: Pick a Moon Weapon to create in hand.
Each round, the first time you play 2 other cards or Round Start: Create the Phased Moon Weapon in hand if you don't already have one.
Your Moon Weapons cost 1 less.
flavorText: "...it is Aphelios and Alune who will best teach them.." - Lunari wanespeaker
name: Aphelios

description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy. If it's a follower, <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> it again at the next <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>. <link=vocab.Phase><style=Vocab>Phase</style></link> <link=card.Infernum><style=AssociatedCard>Infernum</style></link> or <link=card.Crescendum><style=AssociatedCard>Crescendum</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Stun an enemy. If it's a follower, Stun it again at the next Round Start. Phase Infernum or Crescendum.
flavorText: "Doubt weighs heavy on their minds." - Alune
name: Gravitum

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> enemies with 2 or less Power.
descriptionRaw: Play: Stun enemies with 2 or less Power.
flavorText: Through the crystalline silence of the mountainside came the tinkling sounds of falling ice and, far above them, what the travelers could have sworn was... laughter.
name: Sneaky Zeebles

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Heal your Nexus 3. Deal damage to me equal to the amount healed.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Heal your Nexus 3. Deal damage to me equal to the amount healed.
flavorText: "Nobody knows the paths of Targon like I do, so I get stuck with some of the, uh, willful stellacorns. Good thing they've got me to look after them!"
name: Broadbacked Protector

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant 2 allies +0|+4.
descriptionRaw: Play: Grant 2 allies +0|+4.
flavorText: "Listen, Osu. Do you hear that? Bells! Grandfather's back!" - Illi, Star Shepherd
name: Grandfather Rumul

description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Pick 2 enemies.
<link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> them.
descriptionRaw:
Play: Pick 2 enemies.
Round Start: Stun them.
flavorText: Travelers who lock eyes with the creature are said to be struck by a knowledge so profound, an insight so awesome, that their minds crumble beneath its gaze.
name: The Infinite Mindsplitter

description: <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Give me <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Nightfall: Give me Challenger this round.
flavorText: She stood amidst them as she prepared for battle--radiating light, bedecked in silver and blue, her eyes like stars. As the moon rose and shone down on her, each of the Lunari gathered there closed their eyes in silent prayer for her safety, and in gratitude.
name: Diana

description: <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link> or when you activate another <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Give me +2|+0 and <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Nightfall or when you activate another Nightfall: Give me +2|+0 and Challenger this round.
flavorText: Diana raced down the mountain, sword drawn and coated with duskpetal dust. She knew Leona would find her--she was counting on it. Her heart fluttered with anxious anticipation, and she breathed deeply to still it. This time upon their meeting, she would have the upper hand; this time, she would face her old friend head-on.
name: Diana

description:
Give an ally +1|+1 this round.
<link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Draw 1.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Diana</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Give an ally +1|+1 this round.
Nightfall: Draw 1.
Create a Diana in your deck.
flavorText: "Under cover of night, watched over by a pale moon." - Diana
name: Diana's Pale Cascade

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant an ally <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Grant an ally Overwhelm.
flavorText: Those seeking to scale Targon would do well to befriend the local fauna. No creature is more familiar with Targon's perilous gauntlet, and none can travel more swiftly across its icy terrain.
name: Crystal Ibex

description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Gem</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Strike: Create a Gem in hand.
flavorText: The goats of Mount Targon are even more dangerous than their ordinary cousins, for the gems that make up their horns embed painful shards upon impact.
name: Mountain Goat

description: <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Heal me and my supported ally 4.
descriptionRaw: Support: Heal me and my supported ally 4.
flavorText: "Healing is, by its very essence, selfless. You need not draw the power from them; they give it willingly. Show them compassion, and you will see how they shine."
name: Soraka

description:
The first time you heal a damaged ally each round, draw 1.
<link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Fully heal me and my supported ally.
descriptionRaw:
The first time you heal a damaged ally each round, draw 1.
Support: Fully heal me and my supported ally.
flavorText: "What you give of yourself to help others will be returned to you a hundredfold. This is the power of giving. Generosity is a gift that heals the giver as well, in mind, body, and spirit."
name: Soraka

description:
Fully heal damaged allies.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Soraka</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Fully heal damaged allies.
Create a Soraka in your deck.
flavorText: "For life!" - Soraka
name: Soraka's Wish

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Gem</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Gem in hand.
flavorText: "They say the Protector blessed these gems. Wear them, and he shall be with you in spirit."
name: Gift Giver

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Invoke><style=Keyword>Invoke</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Invoke.
flavorText: "Look at all our friends out in the sky tonight! See that extra bright star? That's the Messenger's eye staring down at us! That dim cluster way out there? It is the Trickster hiding behind clouds! And that one over--KULUN, SHH! You cannot paw those down...!"
name: Moondreamer

description: When an ally with <link=keyword.Fury><sprite name=Fury><style=Keyword>Fury</style></link> kills an enemy for the first time each round, create a random Dragon follower in hand.
descriptionRaw: When an ally with Fury kills an enemy for the first time each round, create a random Dragon follower in hand.
flavorText: "Look to the heavens, and see as I do! First the signals, for by night they shine. Then the fury, for by day all burns. You will see! We will all see!" - Herald of Dragons
name: Inviolus Vox

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword></style></link><link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> enemy.
descriptionRaw: Daybreak: Stun the strongest enemy.
flavorText: She stood amidst them as she prepared for battle--radiating light, bedecked in crimson and gold, her eyes like embers. As the rising sun crowned her head in light, each Solari present lowered their eyes, not in shame, but in deference to their shining leader.
name: Leona

description:
Give allies +2|+2 this round. Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Leona</style></link> in your deck.
<link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: Activate all ally <link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link> effects at once.
descriptionRaw:
Give allies +2|+2 this round. Create a Leona in your deck.
Daybreak: Activate all ally Daybreak effects at once.
flavorText:
"She is our unflinching leader in the heavens, the blinding flash of our weapons at noon, and the unquenchable fire that burns in our hearts." 
- Solari Priestess
name: Leona's Morning Light

description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> enemy.
descriptionRaw: Stun the strongest enemy.
flavorText: "The closer they stretch toward the heavens, the more the sun will burn them." - Leona
name: Solar Flare

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword></style></link><link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link> or when you activate another <link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> enemy.
descriptionRaw: Daybreak or when you activate another Daybreak: Stun the strongest enemy.
flavorText: This was what Leona had prepared for. She knew she would find Diana fleeing down the mountain, retreating before the light of the sun. She breathed deeply to still her fluttering heartbeat, willing it silent with grim resolve. This time upon their meeting, she had the upper hand; this time, she would face her old friend head-on.
name: Leona

description: Dragon allies cost 1 less.
descriptionRaw: Dragon allies cost 1 less.
flavorText: The clouds twisted around their massive forms, and the sky itself seemed to shake with their keening wails. She knew what was to come, and yet felt not fear but the warm embrace of destiny.
name: Herald of Dragons

description: <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Give me and my supported ally <link=keyword.Tough><sprite name=Tough><style=Keyword>Tough</style></link> this round. Copy the last spell you cast on only me this round onto that ally (It can't be copied again).
descriptionRaw: Support: Give me and my supported ally Tough this round. Copy the last spell you cast on only me this round onto that ally (It can't be copied again).
levelupDescription: I've seen you target or <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>support</style></link> allies 7+ times<style=Variable></style>.
levelupDescriptionRaw: I've seen you target or support allies 7+ times.
flavorText: "Taric's gentle kindness inspires all who meet him, galvanizing them to find the warmth within to bolster themselves on even the coldest of nights." - Mountain Scryer
name: Taric

description: Grant an ally +0|+2.
descriptionRaw: Grant an ally +0|+2.
flavorText: "Our shield is our conviction, our resolve, our trust in the light!" - Solari Shieldbearer
name: Sunblessed Vigor

flavorText: "Hope is a delicate thing that flies ever higher, and should never be caught." - Lunari Priestess
name: Sparklefly

description: <link=vocab.Silence><style=Vocab>Silence</style></link> a unit this round.
descriptionRaw: Silence a unit this round.
flavorText: "They will know serenity." - Soraka
name: Hush

description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> enemies with 2 or less Power.
descriptionRaw: Stun enemies with 2 or less Power.
flavorText: "Hahahaha, lookit 'em GO!  They're just. So. Fast! Is your head spinning too?!" - Zoe
name: Mischief

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword></style></link><link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy. If it's a follower, <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> it again at the next <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Nightfall: Stun an enemy. If it's a follower, Stun it again at the next Round Start.
flavorText:
"Mother Moon, our night is set,
May we halt those who would harm us,
And teach them regret."
- Lunari Prayer
name: The Cloven Way

description: <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: <link=keyword.Invoke><style=Keyword>Invoke</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Nightfall: Invoke.
flavorText: "Oh, stars above, journeying like many pilgrims through the night's expanse--stay with us a moment, tell us what you've seen." - The Paeans of Evening
name: Lunari Priestess

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Heal an ally and your Nexus 3.
descriptionRaw: Play: Heal an ally and your Nexus 3.
flavorText: "See that star moving across the night sky? That's a grown stellacorn. While the young ones lend us their healing magic until they can be returned to the sky, grown stellacorns can wield that power on their own. It is considered very lucky to see one and know it for what it is. Luckier still to care for one." - Lidari, Keeper of the Stars
name: Resplendent Stellacorn

description: <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Grant my supported ally +0|+2.
descriptionRaw: Support: Grant my supported ally +0|+2.
flavorText: In traveling, you must be open to the journey, which will inevitably change you. In traveling, you take something new with you... and you leave something of your old self behind.
name: Tyari the Traveler

description:
Deal 15 to all enemies.
Costs 2 less for each Dragon or Celestial ally you have.
descriptionRaw:
Deal 15 to all enemies.
Costs 2 less for each Dragon or Celestial ally you have.
flavorText: "When the time comes, I think I'll make an example of Runeterra. Perhaps I'll drag its smoldering husk around with me for all eternity. Like a toy. A dead, worthless toy. I don't know. I've not really thought about it much." - Aurelion Sol
name: The Skies Descend

description: <link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Supercool Starchart</style></link> in hand or, if you have one, reduce its cost by 1.
descriptionRaw: Nexus Strike: Create a Supercool Starchart in hand or, if you have one, reduce its cost by 1.
levelupDescription: I've seen you play 10 cards with different names<style=Variable></style>.
levelupDescriptionRaw: I've seen you play 10 cards with different names.
flavorText: "Hey hiiiiiii! Whatcha doin'? Is that a CARD GAME? Can I play too? What?! I'M in YOUR game? Ha! What a silly dimension..."
name: Zoe

description:
<link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy. Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Paddle Star</style></link> in hand.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Zoe</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Stun an enemy. Create a Fleeting Paddle Star in hand.
Create a Zoe in your deck.
flavorText: "Naptime for you! One sparklefly, twoooo sparklefly, thre-- Hey, what'sthatoverthere?!" - Zoe
name: Zoe's Sleepy Trouble Bubble

description:
When I level up, grant your Nexus "When you summon an ally, grant its keywords to all allies."
<link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Behold the Infinite</style></link> that costs 0 in hand.
descriptionRaw:
When I level up, grant your Nexus "When you summon an ally, grant its keywords to all allies."
Nexus Strike: Create a Behold the Infinite that costs 0 in hand.
flavorText: "Ah, the vastness of space and a myriad realities stretched, squished, and squeezed out before us! Maaaaaybe we'll even see my favorite space doggy!"
name: Zoe

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Discard a card to <link=keyword.Invoke><style=Keyword>Invoke</style></link> a Celestial card that costs 3 or less.
descriptionRaw: Play: Discard a card to Invoke a Celestial card that costs 3 or less.
flavorText: "This one's my favorite! I call it 'Metaphysical Identity of the Conscious Psyche'. Unless you tilt your head like this... then it kinda looks like two spoons."
name: Spacey Sketcher

description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Invoke><style=Keyword>Invoke</style></link> a Celestial card that costs 7 or more.
<link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a random Celestial card in hand.
descriptionRaw:
Play: Invoke a Celestial card that costs 7 or more.
Round Start: Create a random Celestial card in hand.
levelupDescription: <link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: Your allies have 25+ total Power<style=Variable></style>.
levelupDescriptionRaw: Round End: Your allies have 25+ total Power.
flavorText: "I don't care what you write about me, you middling creature! Just make sure I'm described as handsome. And magnificent. And also very, very intelligent. Can you spell that?"
name: Aurelion Sol

description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Invoke><style=Keyword>Invoke</style></link> a Celestial card that costs 7 or more.
<link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a random Celestial card in hand.
Your Celestial cards cost 0.
descriptionRaw:
Play: Invoke a Celestial card that costs 7 or more.
Round Start: Create a random Celestial card in hand.
Your Celestial cards cost 0.
flavorText: Aurelion Sol is handsome. And magnificent. And also very, very inteligent.
name: Aurelion Sol

description:
Deal 15 to all enemies.
Costs 2 less for each Dragon or Celestial ally you have.
Create an <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Aurelion Sol</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Deal 15 to all enemies.
Costs 2 less for each Dragon or Celestial ally you have.
Create an Aurelion Sol in your deck.
flavorText: "When the time comes, I think I'll make an example of Runeterra. Perhaps I'll drag its smoldering husk around with me for all eternity. Like a toy. A dead, worthless toy. I don't know. I've not really thought about it much." - Aurelion Sol
name: Aurelion Sol's The Skies Descend

description: Grant an ally +1|+1 and <link=keyword.SpellShield><sprite name=SpellShield><style=Keyword>SpellShield</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Grant an ally +1|+1 and SpellShield.
flavorText: "Honor the mountain." - Taric
name: Bastion

description: <link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Draw 1 and shuffle me into the top 3 cards of your deck.
descriptionRaw: Nexus Strike: Draw 1 and shuffle me into the top 3 cards of your deck.
flavorText:
"Mother Moon, gift me confidence,
Fill me with The Flight's conviction,
Set me on my path."
- Lunari Prayer
name: The Flight

description:
<link=vocab.Silence><style=Vocab>Silence</style></link> 2 enemy units this round.
<link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: They can't block this round.
descriptionRaw:
Silence 2 enemy units this round.
Nightfall: They can't block this round.
flavorText: "Those unaccustomed to the moonlight must learn to see by it, or they will see nothing at all." - Diana
name: Moonlight Affliction

description: Fully heal damaged allies.
descriptionRaw: Fully heal damaged allies.
flavorText: "For life!" - Soraka
name: Wish

description:
Deal 6 to a unit.
<link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: Instead, <link=vocab.Silence><style=Vocab>Silence</style></link> it this round and deal 6 to it.
descriptionRaw:
Deal 6 to a unit.
Daybreak: Instead, Silence it this round and deal 6 to it.
flavorText: Few things survive a gaze as unflinching as the sun's.
name: Sunburst

description: <link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: <link=keyword.Invoke><style=Keyword>Invoke</style></link> a Celestial card that costs 4, 5, or 6.
descriptionRaw: Daybreak: Invoke a Celestial card that costs 4, 5, or 6.
flavorText: The Solari look to the stars for guidance as much as any other Targonian, for the star dearest to their faith is the sun.
name: Solari Priestess

description: Heal an ally 4 and grant it +0|+4.
descriptionRaw: Heal an ally 4 and grant it +0|+4.
flavorText: "You thought you'd beaten us? Ha! We're just getting started." - Broadbacked Protector
name: Astral Protection

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.spell><style=AssociatedCard>Spring Gifts</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Spring Gifts in hand.
flavorText: "Mostly, I mind the springs, but a shepherd's responsibility is first and foremost to their flock. Priorities have been known to collide."
name: Spring Guardian

description: Fully heal an ally.
descriptionRaw: Fully heal an ally.
flavorText: "Let the springs soothe that which ails you." - Spring Guardian
name: Spring Gifts

description: Pick 1 of 3 enemy spells played this game and create a copy in hand.
descriptionRaw: Pick 1 of 3 enemy spells played this game and create a copy in hand.
flavorText: "Oh, that was uh-MAZING! But how much better would it be if I did it instead? 'Kaythanksbyeeee!" - Zoe
name: Spell Thief

description: <link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: Give me <link=keyword.Lifesteal><sprite name=Lifesteal><style=Keyword>Lifesteal</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Daybreak: Give me Lifesteal this round.
flavorText: The Sunforger held up his focus as light streamed into the room. The Solari artifact harnessed the sun's brilliant rays into a powerful enchantment for his weapon.
name: Solari Sunforger

description: <link=keyword.Invoke><style=Keyword>Invoke</style></link> a Celestial card that costs 3 or less.
descriptionRaw: Invoke a Celestial card that costs 3 or less.
flavorText: "And these three EXTRA sparkly stars I call... 'The Celestial Jump Rope'! Or is it more of an upside down happy face?" - Zoe
name: Supercool Starchart

description: <link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: Give me +4|+4 this round.
descriptionRaw: Daybreak: Give me +4|+4 this round.
flavorText: "Shining guardian, your wrath burns like the noonday sun. Come forth and punish those who would trespass on this sacred place." - Sun Guardian's inscription
name: Sun Guardian

description:
<link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Grant my supported ally +2|+2.
<link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Create 3 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Gems</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw:
Support: Grant my supported ally +2|+2.
Last Breath: Create 3 Gems in hand.
flavorText:
"Did you catch anything he said in there?"
"Not a word. Seemed nice, though."
- Emir and Haley, Mountain Sojourners
name: Mentor of the Stones

description: <link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: Give me +0|+4 this round.
descriptionRaw: Daybreak: Give me +0|+4 this round.
flavorText:
"Foolish, not to come under the cover of night." The Shieldbearer straightened. "Lay down your arms, and come peacefully."
The Lunari crouched in silence, readying her curved blades once more. 
So be it. 
The Solari readied herself in turn, lifting her shield to reflect the rays of the rising sun.
name: Solari Shieldbearer

flavorText: Countless challenges await those climbing Mount Targon. Some, like the endless ascent, slowly sap the aspirants' strength. Others are much more immediate.
name: Fused Firebrand

description: Fill your hand with <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Gems</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Fill your hand with Gems.
flavorText: "Turn a gem just so, and it glimmers in the light. Like mortal lives, each has its own inner fire." - Taric
name: Shards of the Mountain

description: Create 5 <link=card.shuffle><style=AssociatedCard>The Messengers</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw: Create 5 The Messengers in your deck.
flavorText: "Time passes, skies turn--the Serpent moves aside and the Messenger takes its place overhead. A season of abundance awaits..." - Lunari Priestess
name: Messenger's Sigil

description: Heal an ally or your Nexus 2. Draw 1.
descriptionRaw: Heal an ally or your Nexus 2. Draw 1.
flavorText: Stellacorns shine brightest when they are happy.
name: Guiding Touch

description: Reduce my cost by 1 for each time you've targeted or supported allies this game.
descriptionRaw: Reduce my cost by 1 for each time you've targeted or supported allies this game.
flavorText: The Arbiter is the mountain's final test, for only the guardian sees beyond the climber's deeds, and into their spirit.
name: Arbiter of the Peak

description: <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Grant me <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Nightfall: Grant me Elusive.
flavorText: "Let us cast our eyes toward the heavens, toward the sun, toward our lady's li-- Wait... What...? What is that...?" - Solari Priest
name: Lunari Shadestalker

description:
Your Celestial cards cost 1 less.
<link=vocab.Allegiance><style=Vocab>Allegiance</style></link>: <link=keyword.Invoke><style=Keyword>Invoke</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Your Celestial cards cost 1 less.
Allegiance: Invoke.
flavorText: "There is much to learn from the stars, from their guidance. For us, they are a constant, a way to chart our path."
name: Mountain Scryer

description: Pick a Moon Weapon to create in hand.
descriptionRaw: Pick a Moon Weapon to create in hand.
flavorText: "Reach out, Aphelios..." - Alune
name: Gifts From Beyond

description:
<link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: The next Dragon or Celestial unit you play costs 2 less.
<link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Create a random Dragon and Celestial follower in hand.
descriptionRaw:
Daybreak: The next Dragon or Celestial unit you play costs 2 less.
Nightfall: Create a random Dragon and Celestial follower in hand.
flavorText:
Dragon scale (Eclipse Dragon, Draco Obscuratus)
Notes: Scale has incredible optical properties. Highly reflective under direct sunlight.
Scribbled: IT ALSO GLOWS AT NIGHT!
- Notes of Anden Mayne, Egghead Researcher
name: Eclipse Dragon

description: <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: My supported ally and I can't take damage or die this round. Copy the last spell you cast on only me this round onto that ally (It can't be copied again).
descriptionRaw: Support: My supported ally and I can't take damage or die this round. Copy the last spell you cast on only me this round onto that ally (It can't be copied again).
flavorText: "Why should Taric show his fellow man kindness? Well, he came to Targon a broken man, intent on climbing the mountain to atone for his sins... and he succeeded. Nobody knows better that all broken things can be made beautiful again." - Mountain Scryer
name: Taric

description:
Grant an ally +3|+3.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Taric</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Grant an ally +3|+3.
Create a Taric in your deck.
flavorText: "A little something from Targon." - Taric
name: Taric's Blessing of Targon

description: When you heal a damaged ally, grant me +2|+0.
descriptionRaw: When you heal a damaged ally, grant me +2|+0.
flavorText: "Ever since I first saw one streak across the night sky, I've loved stellacorns. If only I'd known then that I'd meet so many!"
name: Star Shepherd

description: Each round, the first time you play 2 other cards, refill 2 mana and grant your <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> ally +1|+0. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Each round, the first time you play 2 other cards, refill 2 mana and grant your strongest ally +1|+0.
flavorText: It is here, in the Spirit Realm, that Alune communes with her brother Aphelios. It is she who speaks words of comfort to the silent assassin, and who reaches through the veil to hand him his weapons of retribution.
name: The Veiled Temple

description: Heal an ally 1 and grant it +1|+0.
descriptionRaw: Heal an ally 1 and grant it +1|+0.
flavorText: "You don't need to see to believe. Just have a little faith." - Tyari the Traveler
name: Gem

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: If you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> a Celestial card, grant an ally +1|+1 and <link=keyword.SpellShield><sprite name=SpellShield><style=Keyword>SpellShield</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: If you Behold a Celestial card, grant an ally +1|+1 and SpellShield.
flavorText: "...and then a sparklefly is like stardust that falls down to the ground and then flies back up and they're amazing and I saw one last night that was so pretty and I'm hungry and it flew up all the way to the STARS and then..."
name: Giddy Sparkleologist

description:
Give allies +2|+2 this round.
<link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: Activate all ally <link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link> effects at once.
descriptionRaw:
Give allies +2|+2 this round.
Daybreak: Activate all ally Daybreak effects at once.
flavorText: "We rise with the dawn! March into the light!" - Leona
name: Morning Light

description: <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Give me and an ally <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Nightfall: Give me and an ally Elusive this round.
flavorText: The Lunari waited for nightfall and the safety it assured. The path ahead seemed deserted, but Cygnus knew the Solari camp lay just beyond. He gestured, and the others quietly fell in line behind him.
name: Cygnus the Moonstalker

flavorText: It was the children of Targon who first befriended the younger, more peaceful dragons. Perhaps these juvenile creatures could sense the children's innocent curiosity, and chose, instead of causing them harm, to offer them protection.
name: Whiteflame Protector

description: <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Grant my supported ally +2|+2. If it has <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>, grant its supported ally +2|+2 and continue for each supported ally in succession.
descriptionRaw: Support: Grant my supported ally +2|+2. If it has Support, grant its supported ally +2|+2 and continue for each supported ally in succession.
flavorText: Every person who braves Mount Targon has their reason to climb. Some do it to prove themselves in the eyes of their peers. Others, to prove something to themselves.
name: Mountain Sojourners

flavorText: "Like any fledgling, young stellacorns must eventually take their first faltering flight. In this, they are just like other stars in the night sky, for they fall just as readily. Luckily, we are here to catch them, and when they are ready, return them." - Lidari, Keeper of the Stars
name: Fledgling Stellacorn

description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy. If it's a follower, <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> it again at the next <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Stun an enemy. If it's a follower, Stun it again at the next Round Start.
flavorText: The Solari did not believe that another light could blind--a lesson the Lunari would readily teach.
name: Sky Charge

description: When I'm summoned, refill 2 spell mana if you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> a <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link> card.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, refill 2 spell mana if you Behold a Nightfall card.
flavorText:
"Mother Moon, allow me to remember,
That though I stand in solitude,
Your children dance above,
And I am not alone."
- Lunari Prayer
name: The Sky Shadows

description:
<link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: Create a random <link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link> card in hand.
It's always Day for us.
descriptionRaw:
Daybreak: Create a random Daybreak card in hand.
It's always Day for us.
flavorText: "Keep your faith, Ra-Horak, and our light shall never falter!"
name: Rahvun, Daylight's Spear

description: Deal 4 to an enemy that attacked this round or is <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stunned</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Deal 4 to an enemy that attacked this round or is Stunned.
flavorText: "KaBOOMey!" - Zoe
name: Paddle Star

description: For the rest of the game, allied buffs (except Barrier) are permanent. Draw 1.
descriptionRaw: For the rest of the game, allied buffs (except Barrier) are permanent. Draw 1.
flavorText:
"You know I mean everything that I say
When you see me coming get out of the way
I came to slay I came to slay
Back and I’m better and ready to stay."
- Kai'Sa, 'THE BADDEST'
name: Out Of The Way

description: Draw 2 different Dragons or grant Dragon allies +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: Draw 2 different Dragons or grant Dragon allies +1|+1.
flavorText: "Their cry sounds like a raspy cat. If you ever hear it, you're to turn tail, and find the nearest guard. You hear? Because where there's dragon eggs, there's dragons." - Targonian forager
name: Dragon's Clutch

description: When you heal a damaged ally, give it <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: When you heal a damaged ally, give it Elusive this round.
flavorText: "Stars stay with us for only so long. Once they have been tended to, I return them to the sky in a sudden blaze of starlight... and flailing hooves."
name: Stargazer

description: <link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: Give me +1|+1 this round.
descriptionRaw: Daybreak: Give me +1|+1 this round.
flavorText: As the sun warmed him, he stood watch at the heretic's prison, ignoring the soft pleas that quickly turned to bitter silence.
name: Solari Soldier

description: <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Grant me +2|+0.
descriptionRaw: Nightfall: Grant me +2|+0.
flavorText: "Stoic guardian, the gentle touch of the full moon restores your strength. Awaken and safeguard us from those who would trespass upon this sacred place." - Crescent Guardian's inscription
name: Crescent Guardian

description:
Grant an ally +1|+2 and <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link>.
<link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: Draw a <link=card.me><style=AssociatedCard>Zenith Blade</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Grant an ally +1|+2 and Overwhelm.
Daybreak: Draw a Zenith Blade.
flavorText: "Let the sun imbue you with Her strength!" - Solari Priest
name: Zenith Blade

description: If you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> <link=card.behold><style=AssociatedCard>The Messenger</style></link>, grant Celestial allies <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: If you Behold The Messenger, grant Celestial allies everywhere +1|+1.
flavorText:
"May the Messenger play,
And with his joy,
Light the stars."
- Lunari Prayer
name: Starbone

description: <link=keyword.Invoke><style=Keyword>Invoke</style></link> a Celestial card that costs 7 or more, then heal an ally or your Nexus 4.
descriptionRaw: Invoke a Celestial card that costs 7 or more, then heal an ally or your Nexus 4.
flavorText: "Look to the stars. If you're lucky, I'll look back." - Aurelion Sol
name: Starshaping

flavorText: "Aww, big Stomper don't wanna go through the wittle portal? That's okay, we can-- HAHAHAHA! Just kidding. OUTYOUGO!" - Zoe
name: Startled Stomper

description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy. Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Paddle Star</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Stun an enemy. Create a Fleeting Paddle Star in hand.
flavorText: "Naptime for you! One sparklefly, twoooo sparklefly, thre-- Hey, what'sthatoverthere?!" - Zoe
name: Sleepy Trouble Bubble

description:
Give an ally +1|+1 this round.
<link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Draw 1.
descriptionRaw:
Give an ally +1|+1 this round.
Nightfall: Draw 1.
flavorText: "Under cover of night, watched over by a pale moon." - Diana
name: Pale Cascade

description: Draw 2 different Dragons.
descriptionRaw: Draw 2 different Dragons.
flavorText:
Dragon egg (Screeching Dragon, Draco murmurationis)
Notes: Shell weakened on last turning. Increased movement inside. Cracks on surface superficial?
Scribbled Notes: EGG HATCHING!
- Notes of Anden Mayne, Egghead Researcher
name: Hatched Egg

description: Grant Dragon allies +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: Grant Dragon allies +1|+1.
flavorText:
Dragon egg (Screeching Dragon, Draco murmurationis)
Notes: Shell weakened on last turning. Increased movement inside. Cracks on surface superficial?
Scribbled Notes: EGG HATCHING!
- Notes of Anden Mayne, Egghead Researcher
name: Crushed Egg

description: Grant an ally +3|+3.
descriptionRaw: Grant an ally +3|+3.
flavorText: "A little something from Targon." - Taric
name: Blessing of Targon

flavorText: In space, no one can hear you squee.
name: Porofly

description: While in hand, I have a random keyword that changes each round. When I'm summoned, grant me this keyword.
descriptionRaw: While in hand, I have a random keyword that changes each round. When I'm summoned, grant me this keyword.
flavorText: It's not quite as cuddly as the real thing, but it IS just as cute.
name: Patched Porobot

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Ignition</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Create a Ignition in hand.
flavorText:
Subject requested that we keep only his mind intact, stating "That's where I've stored all my grudges."
- Augmentor's log, entry 1011
name: Ballistic Bot

description: Deal 1 to a unit. Create a <link=card.upgrade><style=AssociatedCard>Death Ray - Mk 2</style></link> in the top 3 cards of your deck.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to a unit. Create a Death Ray - Mk 2 in the top 3 cards of your deck.
flavorText:
"Today, I have successfully demonstrated that radiant energy can be focused into a single powerful beam! With the right improvements, this ray could be a tool of unmatched precision, but there is still much to do."
- Viktor's design annotations
name: Death Ray - Mk 1

description: Deal 3 to a unit.
descriptionRaw: Deal 3 to a unit.
flavorText:
"The beam melts flesh and metal alike with exceptional speed! I have since eagerly integrated it onto my machine body. To see, feel, and dissect the world with such CLARITY... This is the great potential of the human mind unburdened by flesh! A truly glorious evolution!" 
- Viktor's design annotations
name: Death Ray - Mk 3

description: Deal 2 to a unit. Create a <link=card.upgrade><style=AssociatedCard>Death Ray - Mk 3</style></link> in the top 3 cards of your deck.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 to a unit. Create a Death Ray - Mk 3 in the top 3 cards of your deck.
flavorText:
"Altered beam transmission medium, adjusted lenses to optimal focal distances, internal mirrors polished and positioned. Intensity increased tenfold. But it must improve. I MUST IMPROVE!"
- Viktor's design annotations
name: Death Ray - Mk 2

description: When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a <link=card.upgrade><style=AssociatedCard>Hex Core Upgrade</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned or Round Start: Create a Hex Core Upgrade in hand.
flavorText: "Zaun, you have seen your share of tragedies, and the time has come for change. And, as with all great advancements, it must start within you."
name: Viktor

description:
Your created cards cost 1 less.
When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a <link=card.upgrade><style=AssociatedCard>Hex Core Upgrade</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw:
Your created cards cost 1 less.
When I'm summoned or Round Start: Create a Hex Core Upgrade in hand.
flavorText: "Ah, Piltover. As a boy, I looked up to you, the shining 'City of Progress'. But as a man, I see its corrupt foundations, built atop the suffering of our home, Zaun. Today, we herald a new era of Zaunite innovation--and you will be the first to witness our rise!"
name: Viktor

description:
Deal 1 to a unit. Create a <link=card.upgrade><style=AssociatedCard>Death Ray - Mk 2</style></link> in the top 3 cards of your deck.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Viktor</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Deal 1 to a unit. Create a Death Ray - Mk 2 in the top 3 cards of your deck.
Create a Viktor in your deck.
flavorText:
"Today, I have successfully demonstrated that radiant energy can be focused into a single powerful beam! With the right improvements, this ray could be a tool of unmatched precision, but there is still much to do."
- Viktor's design annotations
name: Viktor's Death Ray - Mk 1
